title: Improving the Summoner Profile
body:
So I've just thought of this really cool idea to add to our summoner profiles for anyone who looks at them wanting to find out more info on the player. Maybe putting on the front profile page or on another tab, adding in a **bio**. The player can write in 200 words or less a little bit about themselves and what roles they like/what their playstyle is etc. Maybe even have a little fun and tell people what favourite foods you like, hobbies, interesting facts about yourself. Just things for friends or players trying to recruit others for teams to get to know players better. 

So,

replies.body: I really like this, could be like the Twitter bio system. But there would have to be a way to police it (because you know people are just going to put profanities, insults, and racial slurs in it) but apart from that I would love to see this added.
Maybe we should have top friends and add in a sound bar so people can see your favourite song, maybe even an advertising tab so you know there is sexy singles in your area lol
I think 100 words would be a little less stressful on the client but yeah a great idea and would more easily fit on the frontpage of your summoner profile.
i think this is actually a great idea
